0.label: Baked Potato
0.description: Main Ingredients: Potatoes, olive oil. A nutritious source of vitamins and fiber, promoting digestive health.

1.label: Crispy Chicken
1.description: Main Ingredients: Chicken, flour, breadcrumbs. Protein-rich, though high in fat. Opt for baked versions for a healthier option.

2.label: Donut
2.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, sugar, eggs. Provides quick energy but high in sugar and fat; enjoy in moderation.

3.label: Fries
3.description: Main Ingredients: Potatoes, oil. Offers potassium and vitamin C; baking or air-frying makes it healthier.

4.label: Hot Dog
4.description: Main Ingredients: Sausages, buns. Convenient protein source; can be high in sodium and preservatives.

5.label: Sandwich
5.description: Main Ingredients: Bread, various fillings. Balanced meal with proteins and vegetables; opt for whole-grain and lean proteins.

6.label: Taco
6.description: Main Ingredients: Tortillas, meats, beans. Nutritious with proteins and vegetables; choose lean fillings and whole-grain tortillas.

7.label: Taquito
7.description: Main Ingredients: Tortillas, fillings. Provides protein and fiber; baking instead of frying is healthier.

8.label: Apple Pie
8.description: Main Ingredients: Apples, sugar, flour. Offers fiber and antioxidants; high in sugar and fat, so enjoy moderately.

9.label: Burger
9.description: Main Ingredients: Beef patty, buns. Protein-rich; can be high in fat and calories. Use lean meats and whole-grain buns for better health.

10.label: Butter Naan
10.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, butter. Provides carbohydrates; high in calories and fat due to butter.

11.label: Chai
11.description: Main Ingredients: Tea, milk, spices. Antioxidants from tea and anti-inflammatory benefits from spices; enjoy without excessive sugar.

12.label: Chapati
12.description: Main Ingredients: Whole wheat flour. High in fiber and essential nutrients; supports digestive health.

13.label: Cheesecake
13.description: Main Ingredients: Cream cheese, sugar. Calcium and protein-rich; high in fat and sugar, so enjoy in moderation.

14.label: Chicken Curry
14.description: Main Ingredients: Chicken, spices. Protein-rich with essential vitamins; balanced with vegetables.

15.label: Chole Bhature
15.description: Main Ingredients: Chickpeas, flour. Protein and fiber from chickpeas; high in calories from fried bhature.

16.label: Dal Makhani
16.description: Main Ingredients: Lentils, kidney beans. Rich in protein and fiber; enjoy in moderation due to cream.

17.label: Dhokla
17.description: Main Ingredients: Rice, chickpea flour. Low-fat, high-protein; supports digestive health due to fermentation.

18.label: Fried Rice
18.description: Main Ingredients: Rice, vegetables, meat. Balanced with proteins and carbs; high in sodium if too much soy sauce is used.

19.label: Ice Cream
19.description: Main Ingredients: Milk, cream, sugar. Provides calcium and protein; high in sugar and fat, so consume occasionally.

20.label: Idli
20.description: Main Ingredients: Rice, urad dal. Low-fat, high-protein; beneficial for digestion due to fermentation.

21.label: Jalebi
21.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, sugar syrup. Sweet treat high in sugar; provides quick energy but should be eaten sparingly.

22.label: Kaathi Rolls
22.description: Main Ingredients: Paratha, various fillings. Balanced with carbs, proteins, and vegetables; healthier with whole-grain parathas.

23.label: Kadai Paneer
23.description: Main Ingredients: Paneer, vegetables. Protein and calcium-rich; nutritious with vegetables and spices.

24.label: Kulfi
24.description: Main Ingredients: Milk, cream. High in calcium and protein; enjoy occasionally due to high sugar and fat content.

25.label: Masala Dosa
25.description: Main Ingredients: Rice batter, spiced potato filling. Provides protein and carbs; flavorful and balanced when paired with vegetables.

26.label: Momos
26.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, filling (vegetables or meat). Offers protein and nutrients; opt for steamed over fried for a healthier option.

27.label: Omelette
27.description: Main Ingredients: Eggs, optional fillings. Rich in protein and nutrients; adding vegetables enhances nutritional value.

28.label: Paani Puri
28.description: Main Ingredients: Puri, tamarind water, chickpeas. Mix of carbs and proteins; flavorful but can be high in sodium.

29.label: Pakode
29.description: Main Ingredients: Vegetables, chickpea flour. Protein and fiber-rich; healthier when baked rather than fried.

30.label: Pancakes
30.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk. Provides carbohydrates and protein; can be high in sugar and fat if topped heavily.

31.label: Quesadilla
31.description: Main Ingredients: Tortillas, cheese, various fillings. Offers protein and carbs; can be high in fat, so use lean fillings for a healthier option.

32.label: Ratatouille
32.description: Main Ingredients: Tomatoes, eggplant, zucchini, peppers. A vegetable-rich dish that provides vitamins and antioxidants with low calories.

33.label: Samosa
33.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, potatoes, peas, spices. High in carbs and flavor; baking instead of frying can make it healthier.

34.label: Spring Rolls
34.description: Main Ingredients: Rice paper, vegetables, or meat. Provides protein and vegetables; healthier when steamed or baked.

35.label: Stuffed Bell Peppers
35.description: Main Ingredients: Bell peppers, rice, meat, or beans. Offers a balanced meal with proteins, carbs, and vegetables.

36.label: Tandoori Chicken
36.description: Main Ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, spices. Protein-rich and flavored with spices; healthier when grilled.

37.label: Uttapam
37.description: Main Ingredients: Rice and lentil batter, toppings like vegetables. High in protein and fiber; a nutritious and filling meal.

38.label: Veggie Burger
38.description: Main Ingredients: Plant-based patty, buns. Provides protein and fiber; a healthier alternative to traditional burgers.

39.label: Waffles
39.description: Main Ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk. Offers carbohydrates and protein; can be high in sugar and fat if heavily topped.

40.label: Zucchini Bread
40.description: Main Ingredients: Zucchini, flour, sugar, eggs. Provides some vitamins and minerals from zucchini; enjoy in moderation due to sugar content.
